content.rendered:
GEOKC Campaigns

(GEOKC charitable works or Seva)
Group of dedicated donors to support GEOKC and the kindness of all participants

Constant Financial Need

  • GEOKC Campaigns Goals
  • Current Needs
  • Future Plan & Support

GEOKC Succcess Stories

  • Significant Development
  • Relationship Building
  • New Prospects

Donors News and Updates

Coming soon…

GEOKC Campaigns Newsletter

Download newsletter (PDF)

Campaigns Photo Gallery & Videos

Coming soon…

Specific Features of GEOKC International Branches

The International Prayer Centers of GEOKC

Direct Mail Campaign

GEOKC Direct Mail Campaign is a great campaign and the first step to fulfilling our fundraising needs. It’s a form of direct marketing, which we used for GEOKC to recruit or acquire new donors or members and to inform, cultivate, resolicit, and upgrade the level of their contributions or dues.

Currently, we are in urgent need to request donation from our Hindu Community members as a part of Seva to afford the current expenses of GEOKC. Would you like to be a part of GEOKC? To proceed, please Join Our Mailing List.
